mapper.select: SELECT o.raw_out_order_no, o.raw_out_order_time, o.process_material_id, o.process_material_no, o.process_material_num, o.status, m.id AS material_id, m.material_name, m.standard, c.id AS category_id, c.category_name, u.id AS unit_id, u.unit_name FROM t_raw_out_order o LEFT JOIN t_material m ON m.id = o.material_id LEFT JOIN t_category c ON c.id = m.category_id LEFT JOIN t_unit u ON u.id = m.unit_id WHERE o.company_id = #{companyId}
